name: Van Designer
description:
Decorate spaces of the rich and royal at the turn of the 20th century, balance progressive and classic styles in accordance with your customers needs.  

If you enjoyed decorating spaces in the sims, lego, or just art and design history, this game is for you! 

Featuring cute and (literally) edgy furniture, an amazing soundtrack, a natural  interface, and three rooms to decorate to your and your customers liking.

Loosely  based on architect and artist Henry van de Velde's work and life, definitely check him out, he made some really interesting stuff!

CONTROLS

Rotate: Click/Tap and Drag

Zoom: +/- Buttons or Scrollwheel

Spawn Furniture: Click/Tap on the furniture in the vendors tab.

Move Furniture: Click/Tap on the furniture in the room and drag it.

Rotate Furniture: While draging furniture Keyboard "R" or Rightclick, or second finger tab

Delete Furniture: drag and drop it on one of the X tiles.

Changing the Colors: Click/Tap the plain color button

TEAM TWEEBLE

David Wildemann - Design
Daniel Turner - Programming
Raven Rusch - Art & Sound
Caroline Sofie Dick - Art

Team Tweeble: a small indie team, making cute, edgy and experimental games weekly to bi-weekly.
